original_text:
For you have rejected your people,
    the house of Jacob,
because they are full of things from the east
    and of fortune-tellers like the Philistines,
    and they strike hands with the children of foreigners.
korean_text: 주께서 주의 백성 야곱 족속을 버리셨음은 그들에게 동방 풍속이 가득하며 그들이 블레셋 사람들 같이 점을 치며 이방인과 더불어 손을 잡아 언약하였음이라

sentences.original_text: For you have rejected your people,
because they are full of things from the east
and of fortune-tellers like the Philistines,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 블레셋 사람 같은 점술가들로 가득하며,

sentences.original_text: and they strike hands with the children of foreigners.
